show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: What We Are Not Hearing in the Presidential Campaign

title: What We Are Not Hearing in the Presidential Campaign
content: A talk with Sarah van Gelder, executive editor of Yes! <!--more--> Magazine, about issues that need to be addressed in the current electoral campaigns; her “Climate Emergency Action Plan”; also new discoveries about the nature of bacteria in the human body (they do a lot of good!), which is causing a new, relational perception of the microbiome of humans; poem by Robert Bly
